item.title: The Dubai Chamber has announced the launch of the Dubai Smartpreneur Competition for 2017
item.description:
The Dubai Chamber of Commerce and Industry, working with the Smart Dubai Office, launched the second annual Dubai Smartpreneur Competition. This aligns with the vision of His Highness Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, UAE Vice President and Prime Minister, and Ruler of Dubai, to make Dubai a leading smart city. Source: Dubai Chamber. The event featured a panel discussion about the UAE government’s progress on smart city and innovation initiatives, and what will drive future sustainable growth...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-dubai-chamber-has-announced-the-launch-of-the-dubai-smartpreneur-competition-for-2017/

item.title: HubSpot for Startups simplifies the onboarding process for new businesses
item.description:
HubSpot, a company that provides marketing and sales technology, has launched a new program called HubSpot for Startups. This program is specifically designed to support startups that are working with accelerators, incubators, and entrepreneurial organizations. The program aims to help these small businesses gain momentum in their marketing and sales efforts by offering a substantial 90% discount on HubSpot’s products. These products include tools for customer relationship management (CRM), sales, and marketing...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/hubspot-for-startups-simplifies-the-onboarding-process-for-new-businesses/

item.title: Work together at a beach resort and form new relationships
item.description:
While new coworking spaces and startup events are constantly emerging, forging meaningful connections with startups outside of one’s immediate location can still be challenging. Coworking Camp aims to bridge this gap with its upcoming six-week program. This program offers startups and digital nomads a chance to network and explore business opportunities with like-minded individuals in a relaxed and comfortable environment. Source: Coworking Camp website. Matthias Zeitler, Chief Coworker, highlights the program’s focus on fostering valuable connections and providing a space for rejuvenation...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/work-together-at-a-beach-resort-and-form-new-relationships/

item.title: Alibaba Cloud introduces the Create@Alibaba Cloud startup program
item.description:
Alibaba Cloud, the cloud computing branch of Alibaba Group, has launched its first international startup program, Create@Alibaba Cloud. The program was announced in Singapore, home to Alibaba Cloud’s international headquarters, which will also serve as the regional hub for the initiative. Singapore was selected as the regional hub due to its strong ties and access to other ASEAN markets, such as Thailand, Indonesia, and Malaysia. The company explained that Singapore’s robust connectivity and reputation as Asia’s most entrepreneurial economy enable participating startups to easily connect within Singapore and expand into neighboring markets...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/alibaba-cloud-introduces-the-create-alibaba-cloud-startup-program/
